metadata.feature_description: Display featured posts in a responsive card layout with customizable appearance

steps.action: Navigate to News page containing Publisher module
steps.expected: Featured posts section should be displayed with card grid layout
steps.actual: Featured section displayed with 'Featured' header and card container showing featured posts

steps.action: Scroll to view the featured post card
steps.expected: Featured post card should be visible with proper card layout
steps.actual: Featured post card displayed showing background image area and metadata section at bottom

steps.expected: Card should display title, author, date, and summary
steps.actual: Card displays: Title 'Test Workflow Post - Submit for Review', Posted on '12/30/2025 by Test User2', Summary text describing the publishing workflow test

steps.action: Hover over the featured post card
steps.expected: Card should show hover state with cursor pointer
steps.actual: Card shows cursor pointer on hover indicating it is clickable. The card element has cursor=pointer attribute confirming hover interaction is enabled

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to post detail from card

steps.action: Click on the featured post card
steps.expected: Should navigate to the post detail page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to post detail page at /News/Test-Workflow-Post-Submit-for-Review with breadcrumb, title, date (December 30, 2025), content, and author information

steps.expected: Featured posts should adapt to mobile layout with full-width cards
steps.actual: Mobile layout correctly displayed with full-width featured card, title overlay on card, and Latest section cards below. Mobile-specific card format activated as per CSS media query (max-width: 640px)

steps.expected: Featured posts should display in desktop card format since 768px is above 640px breakpoint
steps.actual: Desktop card format displayed correctly at 768px width with full card details including background image, metadata bar, title, and summary

steps.action: View featured post card background image area
steps.expected: Background image should be displayed on the card
steps.actual: Default placeholder background image (book icon) displayed when no custom image is set. The CardViewManager.js handles background image URL generation via backgroundImage() function

observations: Comment count display feature exists in code (Featured.ascx lines 20-25, 45-50) but requires Disqus integration and ShowNumberOfComments setting to be enabled. No comment counts were visible in the current test environment, likely because Disqus is not configured.
Featured post limit settings are controlled server-side in Featured.ascx.cs via PostList property - the module displays posts marked as featured based on server configuration.
Loading performance was acceptable - Featured posts loaded within normal page load time without noticeable delays.
The code review reveals mobile and desktop card variants with CSS breakpoint at 640px - desktop-card class hidden on mobile, mobile-card class shown on mobile.
